entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 22 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
